description: Authentication endpoint returns 200 status code for invalid credentials instead of 401 Unauthorized
notes: This makes it difficult to distinguish between successful authentication and failed authentication based on status code alone

description: Booking creation returns 500 Internal Server Error for missing required fields instead of 400 Bad Request
expectedBehavior: Should return 400 Bad Request with validation error details
notes: 500 errors indicate server issues, not client validation errors. This masks actual validation failures.

description: Booking operations return 405 Method Not Allowed for non-existing booking IDs instead of 404 Not Found
expectedBehavior: Should return 404 Not Found for non-existing resources
notes: 405 typically indicates the HTTP method is not supported, not that the resource doesn't exist

description: DELETE booking returns 201 Created instead of 204 No Content
expectedBehavior: Should return 204 No Content or 200 OK for successful deletion
notes: 201 status code is semantically incorrect for DELETE operations as nothing is being created

description: API accepts and creates bookings with empty string values for firstname and lastname fields
expectedBehavior: Should return 400 Bad Request and reject bookings with empty strings for required name fields
actualBehavior: Returns 200 OK and creates booking with empty firstname/lastname
notes: Empty strings should be treated as invalid input for name fields. The API distinguishes between missing fields (returns 500) and empty strings (returns 200), but should reject both as invalid.

description: Booking search by date range and combined filters returns empty results even when matching bookings exist
expectedBehavior: Should return bookings that match the specified date range and filter criteria
actualBehavior: Returns empty array even for recently created bookings that match the criteria
affectedParameters: combination of firstname, lastname, checkin, checkout
notes: The API's filtering functionality is unreliable. Date range searches and combined parameter searches often return empty arrays even when bookings matching the criteria were just created. Single parameter searches (firstname or lastname alone) work more reliably. This makes the search functionality nearly unusable for production use.

description: Username field incorrectly highlighted when only password is missing
expectedBehavior: When user provides valid username without password, only the password field should be highlighted with error styling and error icon
actualBehavior: Both username and password fields are highlighted with error styling and error icons
notes: This creates confusion for users as it incorrectly suggests the username field also has an error when it contains valid data. The error message correctly states 'Password is required' but the visual feedback is misleading.

description: Password field incorrectly highlighted when only username is missing
expectedBehavior: When user provides valid password without username, only the username field should be highlighted with error styling and error icon
actualBehavior: Both username and password fields are highlighted with error styling and error icons
notes: This creates confusion for users as it incorrectly suggests the password field also has an error when it contains valid data. The error message correctly states 'Username is required' but the visual feedback is misleading.

description: Twitter social link uses outdated twitter.com URL instead of x.com
expectedBehavior: Twitter link should point to https://x.com/saucelabs (new Twitter/X domain)
actualBehavior: Twitter link points to https://twitter.com/saucelabs (old domain)
notes: Twitter rebranded to X and changed domain from twitter.com to x.com. While twitter.com still redirects, the canonical URL should be updated to x.com for consistency.

description: Terms of Service link is missing from footer despite being mentioned in copyright text
expectedBehavior: Footer should contain a clickable 'Terms of Service' link as referenced in the copyright notice
actualBehavior: Copyright text mentions 'Terms of Service' but no clickable link element exists
notes: The copyright text includes 'Terms of Service | Privacy Policy' but these are not implemented as clickable links. This creates inconsistency and prevents users from accessing important legal documentation.

actualBehavior: Copyright text mentions 'Privacy Policy' but no clickable link element exists
notes: The copyright text includes 'Terms of Service | Privacy Policy' but these are not implemented as clickable links. This creates inconsistency and prevents users from accessing important legal documentation.

description: Product title displays incorrect value for one product card
expectedBehavior: Product card should display 'Sauce Labs T-Shirt (Red)' as the title
actualBehavior: Product card displays 'Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)' as the title
notes: One product card consistently shows wrong title. This appears to be a data issue where the wrong product name is mapped to the product. Affects product listing, cart, and product detail pages.

description: Product description displays incorrect value for one product card
expectedBehavior: Product card should display correct product description matching the product
actualBehavior: Product card displays 'carry.allTheThings() with the sleek, streamlined Sly Pack that melds uncompromising style with unequaled laptop and tablet protection.' which doesn't match the product
notes: One product card consistently shows wrong description. This appears to be a data issue where the wrong description is mapped to the product. The description text uses unconventional naming pattern (carry.allTheThings()) suggesting test data.
